ingredients.ingredient: 2 pounds Brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved lengthwise
6 slices bacon, or more to taste, thinly sliced
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
â…” cup reduced balsamic vinegar, divided

cookingTips: Render bacon until very crispy for maximum flavor, then reserve
Roast Brussels sprouts in rendered bacon fat for deep, savory flavor
Drizzle with reduced balsamic vinegar just before serving for glossy finish
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Bacon fat is the secret to this dish's flavor. Will you roast the Brussels sprouts in it after rendering the bacon?
